channel.title: Video card help
channel.description: I need help finding a good video card to connect my computer to a 37 inch hdtv with a hdmi cable and good for games like call of duty world at war and such. Max I'm willing to pay is $300 at newegg.

item.title: Video card help
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:6, topic:263936”][quote author=chrisn2323 link=topic=348528.msg2680926#msg2680926 date=1235351516]

newegg.com

SAPPHIRE Radeon HD 4850 X2 DirectX 10.1 100270SR 2GB 512-bit (256-bit x...

Buy SAPPHIRE Radeon HD 4850 X2 DirectX 10.1 100270SR 2GB 512-bit (256-bit x 2) GDDR3 PCI Express 2.0 x16 HDCP Ready CrossFireX Support Video Card with fast shipping and top-rated customer service.Once you know, you Newegg!

theres also the gtx 280 or 285 but those are slightly over $300
[/quote]
pretty sure he said he wants hdmi[/quote]
most likely it will come with an hdmi to dvi adapter.

item.title: Video card help
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

500w would be a very minimum even with a high quality brand. Remember that card produces the power of 2 video cards and ATI are not exactly known for their low power usage.

Read full topic

Buy SAPPHIRE Radeon HD 4850 X2 DirectX 10.1 100270SR 2GB 512-bit (256-bit x 2) GDDR3 PCI Express 2.0 x16 HDCP Ready CrossFireX Support Video Card with fast shipping and top-rated customer service.Once you know, you Newegg!

theres also the gtx 280 or 285 but those are slightly over $300
[/quote]Good choice, also ric914 if your planning on running that, your going to need at least a 650w power supply.[/quote]Depends. It should work on a 400 or 500 watt one if you have one by Corsair or any other company that provides many ampere on each cable.
